medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening shortness of breath and chest heaviness for 1 week.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 week prior to presentation, with reported weakness, headache, and arthralgia involving bilateral hands, wrists, ankles, and feet. No significant change in intensity was noted. Symptoms were aggravated by physical activity and relieved somewhat by rest. No other factors noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Rheumatoid arthritis, hypertension, asthma, degenerative disk disease, migraine, with all conditions reportedly controlled with medications. History of smoking (80 pack-years) but quit 2 months prior to presentation.
medical_history.family_history: Family history pertinent for breast cancer in mother, sister, and maternal aunt.
medical_history.social_history: Denied alcohol or recreational drug use. Reported being up-to-date on immunizations, including pneumonia and flu.
